text:
Hey all - does anybody know if when using the custom code workflow actions, if I were to make a call to an external API it comes from a static IP or a dynamic IP?
The developer of a platform we want to connect with is requesting the IPs to whitelist but I cannot find this info anywhere. From what I gather AWS Lambda is used to run the serverless function but without knowing HubSpot's internal Lambda set up it's hard to know how it's configured. Thanks in advance!

Hi there,
In private content page setup,
when user register and login, we can setup the page which page to show after login from settings/website/private content.
I have to setup some questionnaire before redirect to dashboard when member login
I have setup redirect after login to a questionnaire page. Initially question_completed= false for the member. When user complete the questionnaire, a property in contact will be set as question_completed=true.
Now when user login again, I don't want to questionnaire page. I want to redirect to dashboard page using contact.question_completed= true
How do I redirect ? There is no HubL redirect ? Do I have to do with Javascript?
